block.p: 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed eat-in kitchen, parquet foors, 1,000-sq.-ft. terrace, central air-conditioning; maintenance $998, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $599,000 (multiple bids), 2 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 825-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, hardwood floors; common charge $426; taxes $4,296; listed at $400,000, 9 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,400-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 12-ft. ceilings, oversize windows, hardwood floors, 2 exposures, roof garden in building; common charge $580; taxes $2,700; listed at $975,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,360-sq.-ft. postwar condo; 24-hr. doormen, windowed kitchen, dining foyer, hardwood floors; common charge $526; taxes $4,656; listed at $660,000, 3 weeks on market (brokers: Halstead Property Co.; Bellmarc Realty)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a circa-1900 brownstone; bay windows, high ceilings, marble bath, central air-conditioning; maintenance $1,162, 52% tax-deductible; listed at $865,000, 8 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

2-family, 4-story brownstone; 6 bedrooms, 2 1/2 baths, dining room in primary triplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in simplex; marble mantels, pocket doors, floor-to-ceiling windows in each; 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,000; listed at $939,000 (multiple bids), 5 weeks on market (broker: Aguayo & Huebener)

4-family, 4-story brownstone; 1 bedroom, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen in each unit; high ceilings, hardwood floors, decorative mantels in each; full basement, rear garden, 17-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,508; listed at $795,000, 1 week on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

8-bedroom Georgian-style colonial with 3 full and 3 half baths; dining room, double entry halls, eat-in kitchen, library, original moldings and detail, private driveway, 67-by-130-ft. corner lot; taxes $4,400; listed at $750,000, 1 week on market (broker: Wilk Real Estate)

4-bedroom, 1-bath, 65-year-old attached stucco house across the street from park; dining room, hardwood floors, full basement; 18-by-83-ft. lot; taxes $2,218; listed at $540,000, 1 week on market (broker: Sarah Jones Real Estate)

4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 1980's colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, fireplace, whirlpool off master bath, 2-car garage, 0.35-acre lot; taxes $11,300; listed at $529,000 (multiple bids), 15 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker/Country Properties; Houlihan Lawrence)

7-bedroom, 6 1/2-bath, recently constructed Victorian-style house; double-height entry foyer, dining room, den, family room, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, whirlpool bath, French doors, rear deck, 3-car garage, 0.42-acre lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $1.975 million, 18 weeks on market (broker: Van Hoesen Realty; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)

5-bedroom, 11-year-old colonial with 4 full and 2 half baths; dining room, family room with fieldstone fireplace, home office, sunroom, rear deck, hot tub, finished basement, 3-car garage, 2.19-acre lot; taxes $16,360; listed at $1.175 million, 6 weeks on market (broker: Prudential Connecticut Realty)
